content.p: The 2022 UNM-Industry Engagement Day, was held in Penang Skills Development Centre (PSDC) on 11 November 2022. More than 50 guests attended the event. The event started with a networking session among the attendees and a welcoming speech from Professor Dr Sarah Metcalfe, Provost and CEO Of the University of Nottingham Malaysia (UNM), followed by another poignant speech on the University-Industry Partnership from Professor Ir Dr Law Chung Lim, Dean of the Faculty of Science and Engineering (FOSE). Throughout the event, the guests had an appreciation session together with the poster and video showcase from their respective schools/departments. The university would like to thank all the external stakeholders from the industries, local authorities, alumnus, and guests who attended the event and made the event such a great success. Date: 11 November 2022 Venue: Penang Skills Development Centre (PSDC) Advisor Ir Ts Edwin Goh Boon Hoe Chair Ts Dr Kalaimagal Ramakrishnan Co-Chair Dr Premanand Krishnan Co-Chair Ir Dr Teo Fang Yenn Committee Dr Mohammed Tahir Ansari Committee Dr Alison Kim Shan Wee Committee Dr Lee Mei Kee Committee Ms Hanani Abd Rahim Committee Ms Nur Haziqah Hanini Committee Ms Agnes Chin General enquiries: +60 3 8924 8000 Monday - Friday 9:00am - 5:30pm (Except on public holidays) Programme enquiries: +60 3 8924 8686 Monday - Saturday 9:00am - 5:30pm Jalan Broga, 43500 Semenyih Selangor Darul Ehsan Malaysia
